file_content.text: That's the last of them. We'll be good to go in just a few seconds.
Captain--Jorgan here. We've got a situation on the bridge.
Captain, this is Sergeant Dorne. We've encountered a problem on the bridge.
Captain--it's Jorgan. Big trouble up on the bridge.
We got the data, but Imperial reinforcements just showed up out of nowhere--a lot more than we can hold off. Are the bombs planted? Can we pull out?
We're done here. Dorne, take Yuun and cover Jorgan and Forex--we'll rendezvous aboard the ship.
Dorne, cover their exit.
Right away, Captain. Let's move, Sergeant!
We'll meet you back aboard the ship, sir. Jorgan out.
Captain, sir--Sergeant Dorne. A situation has developed on the bridge.
All data has been retrieved, but Imperial reinforcements are overwhelming our position. We can't hold them--are your explosives in place? Are we clear to return to the ship?
Jorgan, take Yuun and give Dorne and Forex some cover while they pull out, then rendezvous back at the ship.
Jorgan, cover their exit.
Already on our way, sir. Just hang in there, people!
We'll try to reach the ship by the time you get there, Captain. Dorne out.
Yuun, you and Forex rendezvous with Jorgan and Dorne and help them out of there. We'll regroup aboard the ship.
Yuun, cover their exit.
Yuun acknowledges, sir. We will travel at utmost speed.
As soon as we're clear, we'll make for the ship. Meet you there, sir--Jorgan out.
We'll rendezvous back aboard the ship, Captain. Dorne out.
Our objectives are complete. I want you all back aboard the ship on the double!
Everyone, fall back!
Roger that! Let's move out!
Yes, sir!
Copy that--let's go!
Understood!
Yes, sir!
I don't like giving up ground--this had better be the entire Imperial Army.
Only run if you have to.
Close enough for my tastes. We'll meet you back at the ship--Jorgan out.
We are indeed vastly outnumbered. We will rendezvous with you at the ship as soon as we're able--Dorne out.
Yeah, that's the spot. One down, Captain. Let's hit the rest so we can get back to Coruscant and the many thankful citizens of the Republic.
Keep your mind on the job, Vik.
Try to focus.
Medals, parades, parties... this could be great.
Sounds good to me.
These crazy missions do have their advantages.
I'll follow your lead.
Stow the commentary and do your job, Vik.
Shut up.
Oh, yes, sir!
There you are. We ready to finish this, or should I pop out for a drink?
Too bad the Imps didn't put a bar on this thing, could use a break.
A drink wouldn't be bad.
Let's get in there and get to work.
Affirmative.
This isn't the time for your attitude, Vik.
Be serious for once.
Sergeant Yuun, you're dismissed. Rendezvous with Sergeant Jorgan, and stay alert.
Sergeant Yuun, rendezvous with Sergeant Dorne and stay sharp.
Sergeant Yuun, go meet up with Forex and await further instructions.
Understood, Captain. Yuun wishes you fortune in your coming task. Farewell.
